name: VRIKING
description:
VRIKING is a Runner game in VR!
Accelerate as fast as you can while collecting points along the way!
Dodge the approaching obstacles!

Features

  • Immerse yourself in a unique gameplay experience.
  • Procedural generation of levels and rewards for an endless and interesting gameplay.
  • Selecting time of day and weather
  • Very easy to control, everyone can understand the basic game mechanics.

From Developer

The game is made by the forces of one person
